name: The Fighting Cubes
description:
In This Game You Can Spawn Cubes And Fight Against Another Cubes , And Make Money To Get More Cubes

                        Feature

One Class (SwordsMan)

Little Map From The Beginning

4 Teams - (RED , BLUE , YELLOW , GREEN)

         In Upcoming Updates

Over 10 Classes

Over 8 Team

Over 3 Maps

Possibly Multiplayer

And Many More Things

                      Controls

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Mouse Wheel Up - Zoom In

Mouse Wheel Down - Zoom Out

Middle Mouse Button - Reset Zoom

Right Mouse Button - Cancel After Cube Spawn

Q - Rotate Left

E - Rotate Right

Developer Website(Other Games) : http://redcodyred.website2.me/

Developer Twitter (Images From Developing) : https://twitter.com/GamerLiber10

Any donation you help me developing this game better . If You Have Any Idea Or Bug You                      Can Write A Comment .
